C I R C U L A R    NO. 24   / 2002 
 
ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE TARMAC AREA OF THE CIVIL 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON PROTOCOL/ MEDICAL / SECURITY 
GROUNDS 
 
In supersession of all previous orders on the subject the following categories of 
persons may be given access to the tarmac area of civil airports in the county on protocol/ 
medical/ security grounds. 
 
A. 
On Grounds of Protocol 
 
The following categories of persons may be permitted access upto the tarmac 
area in their own vehicles along with escort, during departures/ arrivals at all airports in 
the country: 
 
i) 
President  
ii) 
Vice-President 
iii) 
Prime Minister 
iv) 
Visiting Heads of State 
v) 
Visiting Heads of Government 
 
II. 
The following categories of persons may be permitted access in their own 
vehicles without escort , upto the tarmac area at all airports in the country during 
arrivals/ departures. 
 
i) 
Former Presidents of India 
ii) 
Former Prime Ministers 
iii) 
Chief Justice of India 
iv) 
Speaker of Lok Sabha 
v) 
First Lady (Wife of the President of India) 
vi) 
Wife of the Vice-President of India 
vii) 
Foreign Ambassadors/ High Commissioners on their first arrival and final 
departure. 
 
 
III. 
(a) 
The following categories of persons may be permitted access in their own 
vehicle without escort, upto the tarmac area of the civil airports within their States 
/Union Territories  of jurisdiction. 
 
i) 
Governors. 
ii) 
Chief Ministers. 
iii) 
Lt. Governors  of the Union Territories  
 
(b) 
All  Governors / Chief Ministers  may be   permitted  to  avail of the 
facility  of  taking    Airports  Authority  of India  (AAI)  ferry  vehicles
2:
upto the aircraft  during   their  departure / arrival  by air  from /to  at all 
other  airports  in the country. 
 
IV. 
In respect of “Ministers and other dignitaries” from abroad excluding the Head of 
State/ Government, Airports Authority of India can provide them with an Independent 
vehicle for ferrying them to and from the aircraft upto the VIP reception/ terminal where 
after the Protocol Division of the Ministry of External Affairs would make further 
arrangements. In case of bunching of the VIPs at any of the airports, if the fleet of 
sanitized vehicles with the Airports Authority of India is found to be insufficient to cater 
to this ; special arrangements can be made by Airports Authority of India in consultation 
with MEA. 
 
B. 
On Medical  grounds 
:-  
 
 
i) 
Dr. M. Karunanidhi,  Ex-CM.,  Tamil Nadu, Shri  K. Karunakaran, Ex-CM, 
Kerala, and  Shri  Jyoti Basu, Ex-CM, West Bengal are  permitted   the  
facility  of having   access  of their  own vehicles  to the aircraft  during   
their departure/ arrival  at all airports  in the country.   
 
ii) 
Passengers with medical  requirement may be allowed  to  approach  the 
tarmac in AAI  ambulance. 
 
iii) 
Central  Ministers   /  Chief  Ministers / Governors  having  serious  medical    
problem  may be allowed to  take their  identified  and security  cleared   
Government   vehicle  upto the tarmac  at all  civil airports  in the country. 
 
C.  
On  grounds  of security 
 
1. 
SPG  Protectees 
: 
The  SPG  protectees  may be  permitted  the  
facility  of having  access  of their  vehicles  to the   aircraft along with  escort   during   
their  departure / arrival  from / to all   airports  in the country. 
 
II. 
XYZ  Protectees 
 
(a) 
Shri L.K. Advani, Home  Minister,  Govt. Of  India , may be permitted  to 
take  his  own  vehicle  with escort  upto the   aircraft  during  departure  
/ arrival  by air  from /to  airports  in the country. 
 
(b) 
Ms. J.Jayalalitha , CM Tamil Nadu  may be  permitted  to take   her  own 
vehicle  upto  aircraft  at all  civil  airports during  departure  / arrival  by 
air  from /to  airports  in the country in the light of  threat  perception  to 
her  life  and due  to her  special  medical  condition. 
 
(c) 
The   following  category  of  persons  may be   permitted  to  avail of the 
facility  of  taking    Airports  Authority  of India  (AAI)  ferry  vehicles
3:
upto the aircraft  during   their  departure / arrival  by air  from /to  
airports  indicated below  against   their  names:- 
 
S/Shri 
i) 
P.K. Mohanta, Ex-CM  , Assam (airports in NE-Region). 
ii) 
Reishang  Keishang, Ex-CM, Manipur (airports  in NE  Region). 
 
The  above instructions   shall be  strictly  implemented   by  all  concerned.
